channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Monday, December 8
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: A Biologist Explains How Trees ‘Talk’ To Each Other. Hint: They Send Messages Via The Air
item.description: Volatile compounds drifting on the breeze. Electrical pulses firing under bark. Scientists are discovering that trees are anything but silent.
